    US Objective Not to Extend UN Arms Embargo on Iran for Short Period of Time - Pompeo

    The goal of the United States is not to prolong the UN arms embargo imposed on Iran for a short period of time, US Secretary of State Mike Pompeo said in a press briefing on Wednesday

  • Muhammad Irfan 3 hours ago

    German Commerce Chamber Calls for Use of Trade Protection Instruments for Nord Stream 2

    The head of the foreign relations department at the Association of German Chambers of Commerce and Industry (DIHK) Volker Treier on Wednesday called for applying trade protection instruments complying with World Trade Organization (WTO) requirements to the Nord Stream 2 gas project if extraterritorial sanctions are imposed against it
